@pixi/core > PIXI > IRenderableObject

PIXI.IRenderableObject 

interface IRenderableObject

Interface for DisplayObject to interface with Renderer. The minimum APIs needed to implement a renderable object.

Summary

PIXI.IRenderableContainer

Object must have a parent container
